channel.title: Triplex | 24/7 | strong vps | a new way of pking | release
channel.description:
[center]
[b]TripleX[/b]
[img]http://img267.imageshack.us/img267/5086/logopru.gif[/img]
[img]http://i56.tinypic.com/imijbl.png[/img][url=http://www.triplex-rs.com/webclient]Play Now[/url] | [img]http://www.exploit-db.com/wp-content/themes/exploit/images/edb-download.png[/img][url=http://www.triplex-rs.com/webclient/client.jar]Download[/url] | [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/9j41t1.jpg[/img][url=http://www.triplex-rs.com/forum]Forum[/url] | [img]http://battle-x.net/public/style_images/infinite_dark/tick.png[/img] [url=http://www.triplex-rs.com/vote.php]Vote[/url] | [img]http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/5/59/Money.png[/img][url=http://www.triplex-rs.com/donate]Donate[/url]
[b][i]Features[/i][/b]
[b][i] [u]- MAC SUPPORTED[/u] - Vote4PKP (50 Pk Points Per Day!) - Auto Donation System! - Many Players - Chaotics - 2 Homes - 4 Pk Points Per Kill - Gear up in less than 20 seconds - Almost Perfect Switching - Only 20mb cache - Zoom In/Out Buttons - Custom Capes - Custom Packages - Custom Home - Custom Pking Tab - Custom Client[/i][/b]
[b]TripleX Video[/b]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rnMB2_AkYnA&feature=plcp[/youtube] [b][i]Custom Pking Tab[/i] [/b][img]http://img807.imageshack.us/img807/7167/tabs.gif[/img]
[b][i]Custom Capes[/i] [/b][img]http://img859.imageshack.us/img859/9060/capes.gif[/img]
[b]Commands[/b] [img]http://img109.imageshack.us/img109/583/commands.gif[/img]
New Special Bar
[img]http://img62.imageshack.us/img62/8040/specyr.png[/img]
[i][b]Media[/b][/i]
[b]All of the tabs![/b] [img]http://img521.imageshack.us/img521/8407/tabzb.png[/img]
[b]Custom Client with a new login screen![/b] [img]http://img525.imageshack.us/img525/9208/21308428.png[/img]
[b]Amazingly custom made Teleport Interface![/b] [img]http://img191.imageshack.us/img191/5711/40009274.png[/img]
[b]Pk Point Shop[/b] [img]http://img705.imageshack.us/img705/8148/88438352.png[/img]
[b]Home[/b] [img]http://img839.imageshack.us/img839/1961/55296121.png[/img]
[b]Edge Pk[/b] [img]http://img39.imageshack.us/img39/6786/39253972.png[/img]
[b]Fun Pk[/b] [img]http://img526.imageshack.us/img526/8836/12725642.png[/img]
[b]Old School 2006[/b] [img]http://img214.imageshack.us/img214/3193/38365979.png[/img]
[b]Shops[/b] [img]http://img37.imageshack.us/img37/2162/27945446.png[/img]
[b]Donator Point Shop[/b] [img]http://img585.imageshack.us/img585/7923/82075991.png[/img]
[b]Drop Interface for rares![/b] [img]http://img837.imageshack.us/img837/3883/97230091.png[/img]
[b]All the Shops we have![/b] [img]http://img36.imageshack.us/img36/576/shopsg.png[/img]
[/center]
